original_text: He answered, “You shall not strike them down. Would you strike down those whom you have taken captive with your sword and with your bow? Set bread and water before them, that they may eat and drink and go to their master.”
korean_text: 대답하되 치지 마소서 칼과 활로 사로잡은 자인들 어찌 치리이까 떡과 물을 그들 앞에 두어 먹고 마시게 하고 그들의 주인에게로 돌려보내소서 하는지라

sentences.original_text: whom you have taken captive with your sword and with your bow?
sentences.korean_translation: 네 칼과 활로 사로잡은 자들을 말이냐?

sentences.original_text: Set bread and water before them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 앞에 떡과 물을 놓아 주어라.

sentences.original_text: that they may eat and drink
